stimulusHtml: In The Court of Gayumars, Sultan Muhammadâ€™s use of intricacy, fanciful figures, and lavish color had the effect of
choicesHtml: communicating the similarities between Persian history and the life of the court
encouraging viewers to take their time in exploring the details of the work
counteracting prevailing opinions that Persian artistic traditions were outmoded
influencing courtiers to respect their ruler as a direct descendant of Gayumars
